name: Dokkaebi-ga Ganda
summary: Often also refered to as Cobi Comi, after the two kobold protagonists, the game offers standard platforming fare by Senori Box, who should disappear after a few more announcements of games that got never released, only to re-emerge years later as Jaemi Inneun Nyeoseokdeul (재미있는 녀석들).
